code: import Web3 from'web3';import{defaultEthereumConfig}from'./config';import{formatUnits,parseUnits}from'ethers/lib/utils';export function web3ProviderFrom(endpoint,config){var ethConfig=Object.assign(defaultEthereumConfig,config||{});var providerClass=endpoint.includes('wss')?Web3.providers.WebsocketProvider:Web3.providers.HttpProvider;return new providerClass(endpoint,{timeout:ethConfig.ethereumNodeTimeout});}export function balanceToDecimal(s){return formatUnits(s);}export function decimalToBalance(d){var decimals=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:18;return parseUnits(String(d),decimals);}
